citations.narrative:
On the morning of December 15, 2024, zoo staff discovered 3 chickens had been killed by a predator suspected to have
gained access to the barn housing the primary enclosure through a pre-existing space between the barn wall, door, and
the ground. Staff recollected visualizing bite marks and feather loss when the animals were found, and injuries described
on necropsy reporting are consistent with predation, as noted by the Attending Veterinarian. The remaining chickens were
unaffected. There were no other broken or compromised structures noted or suspected as a point of entry. Housing
facilities that fail to restrict other animals from entering may subject animals to predation or other welfare risks. Upon
identifying the space in the housing structure and prior to inspection, the facility sealed this space with a board that also
creates a higher barrier into the housing; no animals have since been affected. The facility must continue to utilize avian
housing that restricts other animals from entry.
Correct by April 4, 2025 and from this day forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.150(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
On the morning of December 15, 2024, zoo staff discovered 3 chickens had been killed by a predator suspected to have 
gained access to the barn housing the primary enclosure through a pre-existing space between the barn wall, door, and 
the ground. Staff recollected visualizing bite marks and feather loss when the animals were found, and injuries described 
on necropsy reporting are consistent with predation, as noted by the Attending Veterinarian. The remaining chickens were 
unaffected. There were no other broken or compromised structures noted or suspected as a point of entry. Housing 
facilities that fail to restrict other animals from entering may subject animals to predation or other welfare risks. Upon 
identifying the space in the housing structure and prior to inspection, the facility sealed this space with a board that also 
creates a higher barrier into the housing; no animals have since been affected. The facility must continue to utilize avian 
housing that restricts other animals from entry.  
 
Correct by April 4, 2025 and from this day forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
